      public DBUtilities()

  • Method Details

    • DBUtilities

      public static void DBUtilities()
      Opens a connection to the database if no connection is existing. If a connection is existing, this connection is closed

    • insertNewUser

      public static int insertNewUser(User user)
      Makes a new entry for a new user in the database when a new user registers. Returns ID of the user on successful insertion
      Parameters:
      user - makes an entry for the user which should be added to the database
      Returns:
      -1 on unsuccessful insertion

    • insertNewEvent

      public static int insertNewEvent(User user, Event event)
      Makes a new entry for a new event in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - the user which created the event for the bridge
      event - event which should be saved
      Returns:
      -1 on unsuccessful insertion

    • editUser

      public static boolean editUser(User user)
      Updates user information in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - user, which wants to update his credentials
      Returns:
      false on unsuccessful editing

    • editEvent

      public static boolean editEvent(Event event)
      Updates an event in the database
      Parameters:
      event - the event which should be updated
      Returns:
      true on successful editing

    • editLocation

      public static boolean editLocation(Location location)
      Updated the location in the database, if the location changes
      Parameters:
      location - the location which should be updated in the database
      Returns:
      true on successful editing

    • verifyUser

      public static boolean verifyUser(String credential, String password)
      Verifies if a given user corresponds to a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      credential - the email or username of the user which should be verified
      Returns:
      true on successful verification

    • isEmailAvailable

      public static boolean isEmailAvailable(String email)
      Checks if a given email is available or not
      Parameters:
      email - email of the user
      Returns:
      true if email is available

    • isUsernameAvailable

      public static boolean isUsernameAvailable(String username)
      Checks if a given username is available
      Parameters:
      username - username of the user
      Returns:
      true if the username is available

    • deleteEvent

      public static boolean deleteEvent(User user, Event event)
      Deletes a given event from database.
      Parameters:
      event - the event which should be deleted
      user - the user who is initiating it
      Returns:
      true on successful deletion

    • deleteUser

      public static boolean deleteUser(User user)

    • fetchEvents

      public static ArrayList<Event> fetchEvents(User user)

    • fetchUser

      public static User fetchUser(String credential)
      This function is for fetching a user.
      Parameters:
      credential - email or username of the user
      Returns:
      user - the user we looked for with the credential

    • fetchAllEventsFromUser

      public static ArrayList<Event> fetchAllEventsFromUser(User user)
      Fetches all events from a given user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user, from which we want all the events
      Returns:
      arraylist with all events a user is participating

    • fetchAllEventsWithReminderFromDatabase

      public static ArrayList<Event> fetchAllEventsWithReminderFromDatabase()
      Fetching all events that need to send remind email
      Returns:
      list of events that need to send remind email

    • fetchAllUsersFromDatabase

      public static ArrayList<User> fetchAllUsersFromDatabase()

    • fetchEventsFromID

      public static Event fetchEventsFromID(int eventID)

    • closePreparedStatement

      private static void closePreparedStatement()
      This function closes an opened preparedStatement

    • closeResultSet

      private static void closeResultSet()
      This function closes an open resultSet

    • insertNewAttachments

      private static void insertNewAttachments(int eventID, ArrayList<File> attachments) throws SQLException, IOException
      Inserts a new file into the database. Return ID on successful insertion
      Parameters:
      eventID - the ID of the event to which the file belongs
      attachments - the files which should be inserted into the database
      Throws:
      SQLException - if something went wrong with the preparedStatement or resultSet
      IOException - if something went wrong with the file handling

    • insertNewParticipants

      public static void insertNewParticipants(int eventID, ArrayList<User> participants) throws SQLException
      Inserts all participants which are in the given event.
      Parameters:
      eventID - the ID of the event with the participants which should be inserted
      participants - list of all participants of this event
      Throws:
      SQLException - when something went wrong with the preparedStatement

    • createUser_EventBridge

      private static void createUser_EventBridge(int userID, int eventID) throws SQLException
      This method should be called everytime a user creates an event for making a reference in the database, so that one knows which user is going to go to which event.
      Parameters:
      userID - ID of the user which creates an event
      eventID - ID of the event to which the user os going to go
      Throws:
      SQLException - if something went wrong with the preparedStatement

    • deleteAttachments

      private static void deleteAttachments(int eventID) throws SQLException
      Deletes a file from the database when an event is which includes an attachment or when the attachment is deleted by user
      Parameters:
      eventID - ID of the event
      Throws:
      SQLException - if something went wrong with the preparedStatement

    • deleteLocation

      private static void deleteLocation(int locationID) throws SQLException
      Deletes the location corresponding to the event which is deleted.
      Parameters:
      locationID - ID of the location
      Throws:
      SQLException - when something went wrong with the preparedStatement

    • deleteParticipants

      private static void deleteParticipants(int eventID) throws SQLException
      Deletes the participants corresponding to the event which is deleted.
      Parameters:
      eventID - the ID of the event which is deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if something went wrong with the preparedStatement.

    • deleteUser_EventBridge

      private static void deleteUser_EventBridge(int userID, int eventID) throws SQLException
      Deletes all references from an event for a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      userID - ID of the user
      eventID - ID of the event
      Throws:
      SQLException - if something went wrong with the PreparedStatement

    • prepareLocationInsertion

      private static void prepareLocationInsertion(Location location, PreparedStatement preparedStatement) throws SQLException
      This method just prevents code redundancy in insertNewLocation and editLocation since this code snippet was in both functions
      Parameters:
      location - the location which should be edited or inserted
      preparedStatement - the preparedStatement
      Throws:
      SQLException - if something went wrong with the preparedStatement

    • insertNewLocation

      private static int insertNewLocation(Location location) throws SQLException
      Makes an entry for a location in the database. Return the ID on successful insertion
      Parameters:
      location - the location which should be saved in the database
      Returns:
      -1 on unsuccessful insertion
      Throws:
      SQLException - if something went wrong with the preparedStatement or resultSet

    • verify

      private static boolean verify(ResultSet resultSet, String searchWith, String credential, String password) throws SQLException
      This method is only used for looping through the table of user and verifying a given user
      Parameters:
      resultSet - the resultSet with the execution of the preparedStatement
      searchWith - defines if we are using the email or the username for searching of the user
      credential - email or username of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Returns:
      true if the user is in the table
      Throws:
      SQLException - if something went wrong with the resultSet

    • fetchLocationFromEvent

      private static Location fetchLocationFromEvent(int locationID) throws SQLException
      This method fetches the location where the event is going to take place.
      Parameters:
      locationID - ID of the location (this is the foreign key if the entity "event")
      Returns:
      object with the location details
      Throws:
      SQLException - if something went wrong with the preparedStatement

    • getUser

      private static User getUser(ResultSet resultSet, String searchWith, String credential) throws SQLException
      This method is only used for getting the user from the database
      Parameters:
      resultSet - the resultSet with the execution of the preparedStatement
      searchWith - defines if we are using the email or the username for searching of the user
      credential - email or username of the user
      Returns:
      user the user we were searching for
      Throws:
      SQLException - if something went wrong with the resultSet

    • fetchParticipants

      private static ArrayList<User> fetchParticipants(int eventID) throws SQLException
      This method fetches all the participants of an event.
      Parameters:
      eventID - ID of the event (primary key of the entity "Event")
      Returns:
      participants - returns a list of participants which participate in the event with the given eventID
      Throws:
      SQLException - if something went wrong if the preparedStatement or resultSet

    • fetchAttachments

      private static ArrayList<File> fetchAttachments(int eventID) throws SQLException, IOException
      This method fetches all attachments for an event.
      Parameters:
      eventID - ID of the event
      Returns:
      returns a list with all the files which are attached to the given event
      Throws:
      SQLException - if something went wrong with the preparedStatement or resultSet
      IOException - if something went wrong with the file handling
